tool_description:
Translate text to 85+ languages. 0.3$ for million symbols 
Free translation of 50.000 characters.
Simple and intuitive API.
For all questions, please contact telegram - https://t.me/translef
name: Translef - translator
title: Translef - translator

api_list.name: List of available languages
api_list.description: This method returns a list of language codes that will be needed in the method to translate the text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translef-translator.p.rapidapi.com/language/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translef-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://translef-translator.p.rapidapi.com/language/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translef-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
